casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

April, 1937.

(April 1, 1937.) Cazenovia National Bank, Respondent, v. Flora M. Chapman and Others, as Administrators, etc., of Grant L. Chapman, Deceased, Appellants.

Decree affirmed, with costs. All concur. (The decree allows plaintiff’s claim against defendants in a proceeding against an estate upon an instrument guaranteeing payment of indorsed notes. Present — Sears, P. J., Bdgeomb, Crosby, Lewis and Cunningham, JJ.
